page.title: 19DellFarm/Guides/Whipsnade
page.content: WINDY SAYLES is the Training Camping Centre belonging to the Dunstable Division Girl Guides. The ground was donated by the late Major.E.K.Blyth (whose idea created the Tree Cathedral).The centre has a splendid building with a large living room,dormitary,modern kitchen, guides room,also showers & WC's.The camp field can take at least 2 Company Camps.Guides & Brownies from all parts of England use the centre in summer. The main function of DELL FARM is to provide residential courses for school children between 10 & 13 years in environmental studies with a rural bias.Farm animals provide a basis for half day visits by infant classes, and mentally handicapped children. It offers opportunities not possible in urban conditions.
